about_us.description_two: Magno Capital is built on timeless resilience, strategic discipline, and an unwavering pursuit of growth.
about_us.description_three: We partner with bold ventures to unlock potential and deliver lasting impact.

our_values.description_one: We help founders refine their business model, organize their financials, and prepare their company to scale  with clarity, focus, and readiness for institutional capital or IPO.
our_values.description_two: We open the right doors  connecting founders to trusted operators, strategic partners, and capital networks that accelerate progress, not just conversations.
our_values.description_three: We move with founders, not above them  offering support that’s aligned, discreet, and focused on long-term success.

portfolio.olaif: Olaif is redefining consumer wellness through science-backed products and transparent innovation.
portfolio.bythen: A digital-native lifestyle brand crafting smart solutions for modern living—sustainability, style, and substance in perfect sync.
portfolio.icx: ICX is our flagship investment platform focused on scaling high-growth consumer and digital-first businesses. To date, we’ve secured over IDR 250 Billion+ in equity across 20+ brands

romario_sumargo.first_paragraph: Romario Sumargo is the CEO of ICX (Indonesia Crowdfunding Exchange) the leading Equity Crowdfunding platform in Indonesia with over Rp 250 Billion equity fund distributed to over 20 brands.
romario_sumargo.second_paragraph: He also active as a Founding Board Member & General Treasurer of ALUDI (Asosiasi Layanan Urun Dana Indonesia) in 2020-2023.

tomy.first_paragraph: Tomy is a seasoned investor and educator with over a decade of experience in the capital markets.
tomy.first_paragraph_two: Prior to co-founding Magno Capital, he built a strong reputation in both public and private market investing.
tomy.second_paragraph: He is the co-founder of Stock Up Indonesia, a widely used investing education platform focused on fundamental investing, serving over 10,000 active users and a community of more than 250,000 followers across social media.
tomy.third_paragraph: Tomy previously served as Head of Portfolio Management at ICX (Indonesia Crowdfunding Exchange), where he oversaw portfolio strategy, secondary market operations, and performance monitoring for all listed companies.
